shelfmark: P. v. I + Bodleian, E. Mus. 93 (3632)
summary: Contemporary addition in English to the margin of the Latin text of Bede’s Historia ecclesiastica. Place of production not known.

notes.head: Addition
notes.body: (fol. 116v) Nu ƿe sceolan herian hel[o]fon rices ƿeardmetudesmihteondhis mod[g]e þanc ƿeorc ƿulder fæder sƿa he ærest sceop eorðebearnumheofon to hrofe þa middab geard moncynnes ƿeard ece drihtent efter teodefyrumonfolden frea ælmihtig halig scyppeod

admin: Described by Mary Swan and Owen Roberson with the assistance of Hollie Morgan and Johanna Green, with reference to published scholarship (2010; 2013).
